text: Zafar Karachiwala is an Indian actor who starred in the television programme Hip Hip Hurray as Rafay (aired on Zee TV). ==Films== * Zakhm (1998) * Manasarovar (2004) as George * Chai Pani Etc (2004) as Satya Kumar * Bye Bye Miss Goodnight (2005) as Rocky * A Mighty Heart (2007) male guest-1 * Superstar (2008) as journalist * Ek Tho Chance (2009) * Delhi Belly (2011) ==References== ==External links== * * Zafar Karachiwala at Bollywood Hungama Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Indian male film actors Category:Indian male television actors Category:Male actors in Hindi cinema
title: Zafar Karachiwala
